data.Title: Google Discover Offers No Content Blocking Options
data.Description: Google confirms no option to block content from Discover, unlike News, highlighting limitations in crawling control.

data.Title: Google Renders All Pages, Including JavaScript-Heavy Sites, for Search
data.Description: Google renders all webpages, including JavaScript-heavy sites, for search indexing.

data.Title: The Importance of the Bing Index in the Age of AI
data.Description: Bing's index is becoming increasingly important for SEO as it now powers ChatGPT, Apple's Siri, Meta AI, LinkedIn AI, and Microsoft Copilot.

data.Title: Google's Disavow Tool: Should You Use It?
data.Description: There's one possible reason to disavow inbound links in circa 2024.

data.Title: Google to Increase Communication with Content Creators
data.Description: Google is increasing its efforts to communicate with content creators, with recent meetings and plans for more in the future.

data.Title: Schema.org Gets a Fresh New Look
data.Description: Schema.org has undergone a design refresh, with a new look for both the website and validator.

data.Title: Google's Privacy Sandbox Outage Raises Concerns Among Ad Execs
data.Description: Google's Privacy Sandbox outage sparks contractual concerns since its terms of service leave users footing the bill even when it doesn't work.

data.Title: The Rise of Longer Videos on YouTube
data.Description: Short-form videos may have surged in popularity over the past several years, but the long-form video format is on the comeback trail.

data.Title: OpenAI Developing 'Strawberry' Project to Enhance AI Reasoning
data.Description: OpenAI is working on a project code named 'Strawberry', formerly known as Q*, which aims to improve AI model reasoning capabilities

data.Title: COPIED Act Aims to Protect Artists and Journalists from AI Content Scraping
data.Description: New Senate bill seeks to protect artists’ and journalists’ content from AI use. Stands for "Content Origin Protection and Integrity from Edited and Deepfaked Media Act"
